title_full: SAP11-BP01 Design SAP workloads for high availability
title: Design SAP workloads for high availability
description: Design SAP workloads with high availability configurations using multiple Availability Zones, SAP clustering solutions, and database replication. Implement automatic failover mechanisms and eliminate single points of failure in critical system components.

title_full: SAP11-BP02 Implement SAP HANA System Replication for database high availability
title: Implement SAP HANA System Replication for database high availability
description: Configure SAP HANA System Replication (HSR) for database high availability with synchronous or asynchronous replication based on your RPO requirements. Use pacemaker clustering with STONITH fencing for automated failover management.

title_full: SAP11-BP03 Use AWS services for SAP application server high availability
title: Use AWS services for SAP application server high availability
description: Deploy SAP application servers across multiple Availability Zones with load balancing using Application Load Balancer or Network Load Balancer. Configure SAP logon groups and message server load distribution for application tier resilience.

title_full: SAP12-BP01 Implement backup and recovery strategies for SAP workloads
title: Implement backup and recovery strategies for SAP workloads
description: Develop comprehensive backup strategies for SAP workloads including database backups, file system backups, and configuration backups. Define RPO and RTO requirements for each SAP system and implement backup solutions that meet these requirements.

title_full: SAP12-BP02 Use AWS Backup for SAP workload data protection
title: Use AWS Backup for SAP workload data protection
description: Configure AWS Backup to protect SAP workloads with centralized backup management, automated backup scheduling, and cross-region backup copies. Use AWS Backup for SAP HANA to enable application-consistent backups integrated with SAP HANA backup tools.

title_full: SAP12-BP03 Store SAP backups in Amazon S3 with appropriate lifecycle policies
title: Store SAP backups in Amazon S3 with appropriate lifecycle policies
description: Store SAP backups in Amazon S3 with appropriate storage classes and lifecycle policies. Use S3 Intelligent-Tiering or transition older backups to S3 Glacier for cost optimization while maintaining required retention periods.

title_full: SAP12-BP04 Conduct periodic tests to validate your recovery procedure
title: Conduct periodic tests to validate your recovery procedure
description: Regularly test backup and recovery procedures for SAP systems to validate they meet defined RTO and RPO objectives. Document test results and update recovery procedures based on lessons learned. Include recovery testing as part of regular disaster recovery exercises.

title_full: SAP13-BP01 Design disaster recovery for SAP workloads
title: Design disaster recovery for SAP workloads
description: Design disaster recovery solutions for SAP workloads based on business criticality and RTO/RPO requirements. Choose appropriate DR strategies including pilot light, warm standby, or multi-site active-active configurations based on recovery objectives and budget.

title_full: SAP13-BP02 Implement cross-region disaster recovery for critical SAP systems
title: Implement cross-region disaster recovery for critical SAP systems
description: Implement cross-region disaster recovery for critical SAP systems using SAP HANA System Replication across AWS Regions, database replication technologies, or backup restoration procedures. Consider using AWS Elastic Disaster Recovery for pilot light or warm standby scenarios.

title_full: SAP13-BP03 Document and test disaster recovery runbooks
title: Document and test disaster recovery runbooks
description: Create detailed disaster recovery runbooks that document step-by-step procedures for failing over and failing back SAP systems. Include network configuration changes, DNS updates, and application startup sequences. Test runbooks regularly to ensure accuracy and team familiarity.

title_full: SAP14-BP01 Manage service quotas for SAP workloads
title: Manage service quotas for SAP workloads
description: Monitor and manage AWS service quotas to ensure SAP workloads have sufficient capacity for normal operations and disaster recovery scenarios. Request quota increases proactively before reaching limits and use AWS Service Quotas for centralized quota management.

title_full: SAP14-BP02 Plan capacity for SAP workload growth
title: Plan capacity for SAP workload growth
description: Develop capacity planning processes for SAP workloads that account for business growth, seasonal variations, and new project requirements. Use AWS Compute Optimizer and SAP sizing guidelines to forecast future capacity needs.
